item.title: Connectiontypesbuyers: Basic Concepts
item.description: <a href="/connectiontypesbuyers/hotel-x/concepts/basicconcepts/supplier-access-client-context/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-exchange"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Supplier, Access, Client and Context</h3> <p>Learn about entities used in HotelX</p> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/connectiontypesbuyers/hotel-x/concepts/basicconcepts/single_multi_mode/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-search-plus"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Single Mode &amp; Multi Mode</h3> <p>Learn about search Multi Mode</p> </div> </div> </a> Previous to know how, please take a look on the basic concepts.

item.title: Connectiontypesbuyers: Advanced Concepts
item.description: <a href="/connectiontypesbuyers/hotel-x/concepts/advancedconcepts/errorwarning/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-exclamation-triangle"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Errors and Warnings</h3> <p>List of errors and warnings in HotelX</p> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/connectiontypesbuyers/hotel-x/concepts/advancedconcepts/settings/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-cog"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Settings</h3> <p>Learn about settings in HotelX</p> </div> </div> </a>
